column1: short ball, angled down leg side
back of a length, tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
back of a length, angling in, defended
length ball on off, defended to point
full, angling in, clipped off the pads to midwicket
short of length, pulled to deep midwicket
clipped from middle stump to midwicket
back of a length, angled in, tucked to deep fine and he has overstepped
fuller ball outside off, clears front leg and slices it over cover
full, dipping on leg, clipped into the on side
full, angling into leg, tries to clip it away but the ball dips and hits the back ankle as it rolls away to deep backward square
full, angled in, turned away to fine leg
full outside off, flashes away from the body and gets beaten
length ball, middle and leg, kept out
straightens from a length after angling in and pings him very high on the pad
full, angling in on off, defended
full, dipping, leans into a drive to extra cover
sticks the bat out and gets beaten as it goes on straight. Hope makes a mess of the grab
slightly squared up as he keeps out this back of a length delivery
defended from the crease
back of a length, defended
short ball, angled in towards off, arches out of the way
fired in the channel outside off and getting it to shape away, Imrul chases and sends a clear nick through to the keeper
full, angled into middle and leg, clipped past midwicket
short outside off, sways out of the line
full on off, opens the face for a drill through point
short of a length, angled in, tucked behind square leg
good length on middle and off, defended
full, swinging away outside off, pushed out to cover
short of a length, punched through backward point
back of a length, angled in, tucked off the hips to midwicket
short of a length, outside off, gets an outside edge towards third man. And he's overstepped again
sends down a full toss on the free-hit delivery and it's clubbed over cow corner
good length around off, blocked
full, angled in, clipped to deep fine leg
full, angled in, clipped away to deep midwicket
short of a length, defended
short, angled in, goes over leg stump
full, leans into a drive to extra cover
short of length, angled in from wide of the crease, and beats the outside edge
short of length, nips away, shuffles across and keeps it out
fires it in from wide of the crease but he's sure of his off-stump and lets it go
back of a length, defended from the crease
length ball, angled in, turned away behind square leg
tucked to midwicket
short of good length, angled in, whipped off the hips to deep backward square
short of a length, shuffles across and knocks it to deep backward point
short outside off, fails to get on top of it and misses as he slaps at it
short of a length, walks across and tries to pull but finds short fine
gets on top of the bounce and blocks
tucks a length ball to midwicket
back of a length outside off, defended
West Indies review an lbw call. Cannoning into leg stump? Walks across to a length ball that curves in, beats the inside edge and pings the pad. Wickets missing
back of a length outside off, dropped in front of mid-off
full on middle and leg, clipped to square leg
short of a length outside off, defended
length ball, angled in, tries to tuck and misses
short of length, gets on top of it and blocks
slides it down leg side
pitched up on middle, drilled to the right of mid-on
slid across on middle, swept behind square
sliding into middle and leg, nudged to square leg
another wide down leg
slides in and clipped to short fine
gets forward and blocks a length ball
pitched up outside off, driven to cover
length ball on the stumps, tapped back to the bowler
fuller ball outside of, driven nicely to deep point by opening the face of the bat and coming forward
full ball on the stumps, driven back past the bowler, where mid-off runs across to collect. Enough time for a fairly easy quick single
keeps it full again, but too straight, ends up on the pads and is tucked to square leg
he's over-stepped and that will be a free hit West Indies really need to sort these extras out. It was a fullish ball on off, bunted back
takes full toll of the free hit fuller ball, slogs across the line. gets it towards the end of hte bat but hit powerfully enough to clear long-on
and he follows that free-hit six with a straight driven four. Didn't go like a rocket from the bat, but was timed well enough to beat the fielder to the long-on fence
tossed up but too full and drifting on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
tossed up on the stumps from around the wicket, he plays with the angle to tickle it down to fine leg
very full again. He's giving it some air, but it's easy pickings if it's so full. Flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
better length that time, drawing the batsman forward to defend outside off
drags this down short, and Tamim stands tall in his crease to punch this past cover
good length all on off, not much turn though. Tamim pushes it towards cover
good length on off, defended to third man with an open face

stopped on the pitch a bit that one, he was coming forward to turn it to the leg side, but ends up popping it in front of him off a leading edge. The ball didn't travel much so never any danger of the bowler being within catching distance
good length on off again, steered to  short third man again
fuller outside off, he comes on the front foot to drive, but straight to extra cover
too short and width given outside off, spoils what has been a good over so far. Mushfiqur is quick to capitalise and slashes it high over point. Bounces in front of the ropes
tries to compensate by going too straight, and is turned away to deep square leg
tossed up, drifting down leg. Bad ball and he takes full toll, going down to sweep it fine
slog-swept to midwicket. Tossed up on off, he spotted it immediately and the ball was full enough to go for it. He gave it a good old wallop, one bounce into the fence
now he goes for the lap shot. Get the ball over the keeper's head and already this is an expensive over, just halfway through
tossed up, and wanted to whip it away but gets a leading edge that trickles back to the bowler
stays back and low that time to his length ball outside off and late cuts it fine enough to pick up two
back of a length on off again, and he stays back and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
back of a length, but angling too much into the batsman, ends up on his pads. He's unable to connect with the flick off his hips though
good length on leg stump, tapped to short midwicket
back of a length on the stumps, short enough for him to stay back and flick it to fine leg. Ball was in the air for a while but safe because there's no short fine leg
good length on off, steered to point
good length outside off, dabs it down to third man
slightly fuller on the stumps, he comes forward to squirt this to third man. And it's time for drinks
well tossed up, very full, driven to long-on
good length, tossed up on leg and middle, he comes forward and drives to cover
tossed up on middle, he goes deep in his crease to play it to square leg
good length outside off, draws him forward. Patted back to the bowler
given lots of air, lands almost at his feet, driven back but off the toe end
good length, but fractionally shorter which allows him to punch to long-on
rocks back to pull this powerfully to deep square leg. Short ball that didn't rise very high
delicately nudged to third man, but just a single. Back of a length on off, good execution, opening the bat face
diving stop by Hetmyer at point too full outside off, he flays it, but Hetmyer dives to his left to save runs

just short of Roston Chase at deep point wrong choice of shot, he came down the track to a short ball, outside off, ends up slashing it in the air. It lands inches in front of Chase who was running forward
fuller ball on the stumps, driven to mid-on
length ball on off, pushed to extra cover
tossed up, turning a bit from middle, comes forward to defend. NO-ball so it will be another free hit
he doesn't read the quicker one, ends up pushing at it tamely. the free hit goes unpunished
tossed up and defended
sweeps it fine but it goes off the top edge. Lands safe though at short fine
tossed up on off, driven down to long-on off the front foot
tossed up on a good length, draws him forward to defend
strays on the pads and is clipped to fine leg
fullish on the stumps, played off his toes but straight to short midwicket
good length on the stumps, gets right behind the line to defend solidly
length ball, but on the pads, flicked off his hips to fine leg. 100 up for Bangladesh, and the second fifty has come off just 47 balls
length ball leg stump, played towards midwicket
back of a length, loses his line and strays on the pads, but the batsman can't take advantage. Pushed to short fine leg
good length angling across the left hander, who comes on the front foot and plays it to mid on
tossed up outside off, he comes forward to defend but the ball doesn't turn much and goes past the outside edge
top edge off reverse sweep but Tamim is safe. It plops up just behind the keeper and out of reach. He didn't get hold of it at all
tossed up on middle and leg, turning away, defended carefully into the off side
loud appeal but not given. Went down on one knee to sweep, and was struck on the pads. Perhaps it was missing off? West Indies don't have a review left
stays back to turn this to deep square leg
given some air outside off, he pushes it to backward point.
length ball outside off, defended back
length on off, moves across and drills it down to long-on
leg side length ball, tucked off the pads to deep fine leg
full, angled across off, leans into a drive to extra cover
short and wide, slapped past point diving to his right
now he angles one into the pads and Mushfiq turns it away behind square for his fifty
pitched up outside off, driven to point
takes a good stride across and turns it away into the on side
length, spins in, shuffles across and defends
short of length, spins in, backs away and cuts through point
full, spinning in from outside off, drilled to long-on
gets forward and pushes into the covers
back of a length, tucked off the pads to deep midwicket
pushes a fuller one down to long-on
length, tucked off the pads to square leg
slower cutter, gets down to paddle it and makes no contact. West Indies appeal for a caught-behind but appeal withheld
length, angled in, punched to long-on
fetches a sweep from outside off and gets a top-edge towards deep square
spins in from a length, nudged to the bowler's left
gets down for a big slog and has to fetch it from well outside off, drags it down the throat of deep midwicket where Roach takes it in front of him
flicked to midwicket
spins away and punched to long-off
full outside off, clipped to the bowler's right
shortish outside off, defended
bouncer outside off, arches away
length, angling in, tucked to the on side
back of a length, angled in, tucked behind square
tries to get on top of it and slaps it to backward point
short of length on off, blocked towards point
short and wide, cut to deep point
tucked to backward square
length, spinning in, tucked to square leg
defended on the front foot
full outside off, driven to cover
short of length, angled down leg
shaping away and finds the edge. Good pace, jags away off a short of a length and Mushfiq flashes, trying to cut, sends a catch to the keeper
short ball, can't get on top of the bounce completely as he gets an outside edge off the bat shoulder towards slip
short of length, down the leg side
punches to sweeper cover
short, spinning away, cut to deep point
comes down to a flat delivery and eases it down to long-on
length, draws him forward and spins past the outside edge
back of a length, spinning away, punched off the backfoot
full, middle and leg, defended
spins away from a length, gets forward and defends
short of length outside off, opens the face to point
short, wide, cut to deep backward point
short, climbs on him outside off as he arches away
short of good length, holds its line and rips past the outside edge
short of length, opens the face to third man
short ball down the leg side
full, angled across off, slapped down to long-off
length, straightens on middle, backs away and cuts to deep cover
full, middle and leg, defended
short of length outside off, backs away and slaps through point
full, middle and leg, nudged into the on side
shifts back and whips against the turn to deep midwicket

inside edge runs down to fine leg for four stuck his bat out outside off, very casual shot. the ball was not full enough to drive, takes the edge, misses the stumps. The bowler's got his hands on his head
fuller on off, much more careful in defence that time, with bat close to pad. Pushes the ball to cover
slower ball, jagging back in from outside off. He waits for it and steers it to backward point
digs it in short, on middle stump, but Shakib is in control of the shot, pulling it down to deep square leg
back of a length outside off, moving back into the batsman who stays back and works it to midwicket
back of a length, angling into the batsman from around the stumps. Defended back. And it's time for drinks
tossed up on middle and off, turning away. Stays in his crease and punches to cover
flatter on middle, doesn't turn as much. Slapped to cover
that looked slightly quicker, he was hurried into the shot, didn't connect well with the intended cut.
drags it down short, and he rocks back to pull, but can't get hold of it. It goes to mid-on
stays back to push this to point
tossed up on leg and middle, gets the batsman forward to defend
short ball outside off, Shakib completely mis-times his pull. Too early into the shot, gets it on the end of the bat and the ball travels down to long-on
short and wide outside off, stroked to deep point fairly easily
shorter outside off, dabbed to short third man. They decide against the single, rightly so
another good short ball, angling into the stumps and he taps it down near him
good length now, and Shakib was hanging back a bit due to the short balls. A bit late to come down on it, ends up punching it to mid-on off a thickish inside edge
good length on the stumps, chopped to point
nicely tossed up on off, turning away, he plays with the spin to push it towards point
slightly short, and he goes deep inside his crease to punch it past cover, who fumbles while trying to dive and field, allowing the single
down the track and takes it on the half-volley, swipes it down to long-on
tossed up, very full on the stumps, driven but straight to short cover
squirts it off the outside edge to point. Hung back to this, wasn't short enough, ends up poking at it. The ball turns enough to take the edge
slightly shorter, he stays back and cuts it to deep cover. End of a fantastic spell from Bishoo
good length, very straight, and pushed to long-off
full ball and very straight, driven to long-on
very full and straight again, driven to long-off from his crease
length ball outside off, glides it to point
full, drifting on the pads, but he misses the flick. The ball rolls to short midwicket, and no single there with the bowler quickly across to field
good length, coming back in a touch, defended solidly on off stump
fuller length on off, driven back past the bowler for a single
back of a length outside of, he tries to dab it past point, but gets n under-edge
loses his line, and that ends up well outside the tram line to be a wide
good length outside off, he lets it come to him and runs it down to third man
good length, angling into the left-hander, who punches it to a widish mid-on
back of a length outside off, he stays in his crease and punches it past cover
fuller ball that time, and it's played back to the bowler
chipped over the in-field and down to long-off. Not exactly where he wanted to send it, but controlled well in the end
good length outside off, he takes a half step forward to drive, but straight to cover
he's varying his length, went very full that time. Mahmuddullah was late in bringing bat down, and just manages to hit it back to the bowler
back of a length now outside off, steered to point
gets one away the dot balls were building for Mahmudullah, but this was nicely dealt with. Back of a length outside off, he transferred weight back and cut it past gully for a well-timed four
fuller ball, he picks it up from outside off and wrists it to long-on
full ball on middle, picked off his toes to deep square leg
length ball angling into him, pushed back to the bowler
good length angling into him again, he punches it to long-on
goes for it and connects very full and in the slot to drive, he went at it powerfully and sent it over extra cover and into the fence
length ball outside off, steered to short third man
driven nicely but straight to cover. Full ball, in the slot to drive, and Mahmudullah's finding his timing now, but this was straight to the fielder
fuller ball, driven to mid-on
back of a length, angling across him, pushed to mid-off
length ball on leg stump, he comes forward to flick it to deep midwicket
goes fuller then, and Shakib is expecting that perhaps, goes down to sweep and sends it to square leg
fuller ball outside off, flicked to midwicket
back of a length, he comes forward to work it to deep square leg for a couple
back of a length outside off, cut to point
back of a length outside off, goes for the drive but it only goes to cover off the inside half of the bat
leading edge travels high to fine leg Darren Bravo perhaps was too slow to react, or lost the ball. It ends up dropping just in front of him, running sideways from fine leg along the rope.
length ball, flicked to mid-on
much more in control of that, flicked off his pads for four. Too short and punished

fuller length, driven to long-on. Not timed that well which means they can run two. This was the over of acceleration Bangladesh needed perhaps, and with that, it's time for Akshay to take you through the last ten
full outside off, wristily whips it to the right of long-on
length ball on off, shovelled to long-on
length ball, swings across the line from off stump and gets a thick leading edge to cover where the fielder grabs it at the edge of the circle
loses shape as he swings hard and across the line and gets an outside edge to third man
chips a length ball down to long-off
full, pushed across, drilled through the covers
short of a length outside off, opens the face to third man
back of a length around off, opens the face to third man
short and wide, cut to deep point
length outside off, shovels it hard straight to cover
short of a length outside off, opens the face to third man
pushes at a wide one and gets an outside edge to third man
short and wide, chops a cut to sweeper cover
opens the face to third man
back of a length on off, pulled to deep midwicket
short, arches back and ramps it over the keeper but Bishoo at third man runs forward and snares it
full, angled in, pushed to long-on
full on middle, drilled to wide long-on
full, chases this wide one and misses
slower length ball, punched down to long-on
full outside off, clipped to deep square
full, angled in, clipped to long-on
short, wide, slaps it hard through cover
critical no-ball, denies him a wicket. Oversteps before bowling this short of a length, pulled away to midwicket who arches back and snares it over his head
maximises the free-hit.. poor delivery. Shortish, angled across on off, rocks back and pulls over deep midwicket for his fifty
back of a length, angled across giving him too much room, slapped through point
short on off, pulled to deep midwicket
full outside off, driven to cover
comes down to a shortish one that angles in and beats the edge as he swings
ffull, angled in, clipped between deep midwicket and long-on
back of a length, slow and shaping away outside off, has a gentle feel for it and gets beaten
drills a fuller one away to deep point
full toss, swung across to deep midwicket
back of a length, swings across the line but this one's a little wide of him and he miscues it off the toe-end to deep square leg who takes a well-judged catch
short of length, slower as he swings across the line and misses as the ball doesn't bounce
back of a length, slow again and he moves too far away as he swings and misses
another slower ball, angles in and pings the thigh as he pulls early
slower ball again, steps down the ground and slaps at it but misses
shuffles across and makes use of the angle to paddle it fine leg
slower ball, off cutter, swings early with the pull and the ball goes past the under edge to clatter into the stumps
swings hard at a fuller one outside off and gets an inside edge to backward square leg
full outside off, inside-edged to deep fine leg
driven to cover who dives to his left and half-stops it
leans into a drive and carves it away through the covers, beating the fielder giving it chase
tucks a length ball to midwicket
full toss, slapped to sweeper cover
short of a length, slower, cops a blow on the torso as he misses a pull
back of a length, angled in at a slower pace, pulled to short fine
shuffles across a long way but this is too slow again and he can't put away the paddle
this is ridiculous.. another slow ball, they are learning nothing. Another swing and a miss
short, slow, pull and a miss
backs away to a yorker outside off and gets beaten
backs away to a length ball and slaps it off the toe end to sweeper cover
back of a length, angled in swatted away to midwicket
Mehidy has hit more air molecules than balls today. another swing and a miss as he doesn't bother getting close to it
backs away to a full toss on middle and leg and drives it to mid-off
backs away, full and outside off, jams the bat down and makes no contact
back of a length on off, no turn, swatted to long-on
length ball on middle, slight turn on offer, but slow enough for him to go on the back foot and whip it to deep midwicket
tossed up that time, on off, he comes forward and turns it away towards square leg
given some air outside off, but a tad short, and punched powerfully past cover
tossed up outside off, patted back to the bowler
tossed up, dipping nicely on the batsman who stays in his crease and defends
tossed up on the stumps, he comes forward and drives it to long-on

loud appeal and given! Hemraj talks to Hope, and walks off. Angled into the batsman from around the stumps, drifts in goes with the arm to hit him on the pad. He might have thought it would turn, bat was beside pad in his lunging forward defense. Good call not to review, DRS shows three reds.
tossed up outside off again, Bravo drives to long-off
clipped to midwicket
nicely tossed up again, but Bravo comes forward to meet it equally nicely, drives it to cover
length ball, spinning back into the right-hander who goes deep in his crease to flick it to midwicket
tossed up on middle, very full, clipped to midwicket
slightly flatter on a good length, turned towards midwicket again
fuller, given some air, he picks it off his toes to mid-on
flatter and too full, clipped to long-on off his pads
good length tossed up, draws him forward to stretch and defend
very full, he makes room and drives to mid-on
fuller ball outside off, steered to point's right. He wanted a single but was turned down
comes forward to defend outside off, the ball trickles off the outside edge. Bounces well short of the lone slip, who stretches to his left to prevent runs off the ball
good length on off, he drives with the spin to long-off
good length on off, he comes forward to drive it, but straight to mid-off
drifts on the pads, and he stays back in his crease, allows it to come to him and turns it to midwicket
length ball, drifting on the pads a tad, tucked towards short fine leg
given some air, outside off, he comes forward but the ball squirts towards point off the outside edge
length ball, he chooses to stay back to it and pats it back to the bowler
flatter on the stumps, tapped to the bowler's left
fuller on off, he opens the face to steer it towards point
gave himself room and tried to go big, inside out over cover, but only gets an inside edge that ricochets off his pad
fuller ball outside off, comes forward to defend
driven to long-off
drags it down short and flat, clipped to midwicket from his crease
tossed up a bit more, he comes forward and drives it, but cover tumbles and fields
length ball on the stumps, watchfully defended off the front foot
quicker and flatter on a length, on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
slightly back of a length, he transfers weight back and punches it to long-on
fuller on the stumps, he defends from the crease
flighted outside off, he went down to sweep. Ball hits pad and there is a stifled appeal. But that was hitting him outside off
back of a length on off, he stays in his crease and punches to wide long-off
flatter outside off, pushed to cover. There hasn't been much turn for the spinners so far
tossed up and dips nicely, beats Bravo's attempted flick and hits him high on the pad
good shot transfers weight back to powerfully punch this through the off side cordon. It was marginally short and he spotted it early and took full toll
drifts down leg, and is picked off his pads by going deep into the crease and flicking to midwicket
drifts too far down leg, past the pad. Wide
nicely flighted and beats him, strikes him on the pad. Belts out an appeal but the umpire is ummoved. Probably sliding down
comes forward to turn this round the corner
comes on the front foot to this fuller length ball and wrists it to midwicket
quicker ball, slightly shorter, punched back to the bowler

big appeal They're thinking about a review but decide against it. Nicely flighted, the batsman took a few steps down the track and tried to play a big, booming drive, but was beaten and hit on the pads. The bowler seemed confident, but perhaps the batsman was too far down for Mashrafe Mortaza to chance a review
starts off with a loosener down leg, which will be a wide
strays on the pads again and is picked off to fine leg
back of a length, angled across, he stood tall and punched it, but Mehidy at point dived to his right to prevent a possible boundary
angled across him again, he defends outside off
over the top and all the way stunning shot, slightly back of a length, he comes on the front foot and hits it on the up from outside off. Carries all the way over wide long-off
back of a length, patted back to the bowler
attempted yorker, dug out to mid-off for a single
sweeps it with the turn and nails it nicely, sending to deep square leg for a boundary
length ball, he goes back in his crease to whip it to mid-on
fuller length on the pads, tapped back to the bowler's right. He dives and mis-fields, padding the ball away, that allows a single
fuller angling into the batsman, defended into the off side
quicker one, drags it short. Bravo defends from the crease
fuller ball, Bravo drives it gently into the off side
short of good length, nips away and squares him up as it beats the outside edge
good length on middle, defended
shortish on middle and leg, pulled off the hips to deep square
short of length outside off, punched to deep point
length ball, slanted across on middle, defended
short of good length outside off, punched to deep point
length, spinning in, pushed to mid-on
drills this back of a length ball back to the bowler
slider, goes to midwicket off the inside of the bat
slashes it away to sweeper cover
full, sliding into middle, pushed back off the inside of the bat
short of a length on middle and leg, punched to long-on
back of a length, pushes back and drops to point
good length outside off, flayed over the in-field at cover
fuller of a length, angling into leg, pushed down to mid-on
short of a length, defended around off
sliding length ball on leg, defended
tries to nudge it away and finds short fine
short of length outside off, punched down to mid-off
fuller of a length, spinning away, defended
backfoot punch through cover
flat length ball, punched down to long-on
short of length outside off, punched to point
just back of a length, advances down the ground and mows it over to the right of sightscreen after giving himself room
defended down the pitch
full, angled into middle, heaved over deep midwicket. Powerful wrists
good length, angled into middle and leg, drilled towards mid-on
looped around middle, but shortish and enough room to shift back and slash it away through the covers
full on middle and off, driven down to long-on
pitched up outside off, driven to cover
pushed into the covers for a quick one
flat and full on middle, defended back
back of a length, lots of width, slapped straight to point
short of a length, tucked to square leg
back of a length, slanted across, punched to extra cover
bowled around the legs. Back of a length, keeps a little low, he tries to tuck it around off the pads but the ball skips through and clatters into the stumps
full outside off, defended into the off side
short of length outside off, shuffles across and keeps it out
full outside off, leans into a drive to sweeper cover
back of a length, angling in, stays back and defends
back of a length, angled into middle, tucked to midwicket
short of a length on off, defended
slower length ball, gets forward and pushes into the off side. He has overstepped
short, angling in, swivels and pulls over square leg
short of a length around off, punched to extra cover off the backfoot
tucked to deep square leg
length on off, defended between midwicket and mid-on
short ball, gets under it
short, angled over his left shoulder as he half-ducks
length ball outside off, pushed into cover for a quick one
short of length on middle, nudged to midwicket
short of length, nudged with the angle behind square
short of length, cuts in, blocked to mid-on
short of a length, angled in, tucked to midwicket
full around off, driven to the right of sweeper cover
full and slow at 115ks outside off, pushed to extra cover
short of a length, opens the face past backward point
length on off, blocked to point
short ball, rises on the toes and drops it into the on side
short of length, outside off, pulled through the cow corner region
short of good length outside off, punched off the backfoot to sweeper cover
short around off, pushes back and defends
cuts in from a back of a length, tucked to midwicket
short of length outside off, gets behind the line and defends
back of a length outside off, punched to mid-off
good length on off, punched to extra cover
slower full ball on middle, defended
full on middle, defended
full, sliding in, clipped to square leg
sliding into middle, drilled back
full, leans into a drive towards deep cover
pitched up on off, blocked to point
short of a length on off, punched to sweeper cover
short of a length outside off, backfoot punch through cover
back of a length, tucked to midwicket
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
full on off, drilled down to mid-on
slid into middle, driven back
pitched up on middle, driven wide of long-off
full on middle and leg, blocked
full outside off, driven through extra cover
short and wide, cut to sweeper cover
comes down the ground and gets to the pitch and goes inside-out through the covers
length, tries to tuck but the ball clips the pad and runs down to fine leg
short of length, punched off the backfoot to covers
back of a length, defended down the pitch
short of good length, pitching outside leg, nudged into the on side
short of good length, pitching outside leg, dropped to point
pitched up on middle and off, driven to extra cover
looped up on middle, blocked off the front foot
full on middle and off, driven to long-off
turned away behind square leg
backs away and punches to sweeper cover
short, sitting up nicely on off, muscles a pull off the backfoot through deep midwicket
short, angled across, slapped to deep point
back of a length, defended to point
swing and a miss outside off
good length, angling into middle, keeps low as he stays back and gets an outside edge too third man
full outside off, slashes hard at it and gets a thick outside edge that lands short of deep backward point
full, angled into middle, clipped to midwicket
short of a length, punched off the backfoot to point who flings himself to his right to make a brilliant save
arches away and pulls a short ball to deep square
goes for another pull but this time the ball skips through to the keeper
back of a length outside off, shovels it over cow corner
short of good length, whips it from outside off, to deep midwicket
short of a length, angled across off, it's a cutter, he has a feel for it and misses
swings and misses at another slower one
tries to pull but gets an underedge that evades a diving keeper to deep fine leg
back of a length, cuts away outside off, slower again, has a feel for it and sends an outside edge through to the keeper
length ball on off, punched to extra cover
fuller on the stumps, driven back past the bowler for a couple
length ball, he goes back in his crease to tap it to long-on
fuller ball on off stump, steered to point

dropped at short fine leg Short ball on leg, he swivels to pull it, Imrul Kayes found the ball coming to him almost before he was ready for it, burst right through of his hands, hit him on the chest and rolls away. Kayes seems to have been hit rather hard by that ball, and he's going off the field. It was well struck by Hetmyer, which contributed to it coming so quickly that Kayes couldn't react in time to catch it
good short ball, rears up from back of a length and surprises Hetymyer a bit, who gets his bat up at the last moment to defend tentatively
fuller ball on off, comes forward and drives it nicely through extra cover, showing the full face of the bat before opening it to get the placement right
back of a length, he stands tall in his crease and punches to cover
slower ball on the stumps, he was into the drive a bit early and the ball hung in the air for a while, but dropped halfway down the pitch. Mashrafe fields

comes down the track and the bowler follows him to almost york him. Well adjusted by Hope though, who tickles it round the corner. Poor effort by short fine leg, what should have been one, turns into three
misses with the attempted dab to third man. Slower ball in the channel outside off
fuller length angling into the pads, and tucked to square leg
Biff - take that slower one on a length, he frees his arms and hits it straight back over the bowler and over the straight boundary rope. He's not going to hang around
over the bowler's head once again with a horizontal bat, but not as well timed, and he gets a couple
very full on the stumps, he waits in his crease and just opens the face of the bat to run it to third man
full length outside off, driven crisply to cover
stays in his crease and late cuts it past the keeper very fine to third man. Mustafizur running in stops the ball with his boot, and over-runs it, but comes back to throw the ball in. Saved a couple

Hetmyer's lived by the sword and dies by it back of a length, quick ball, Hetmyer wanted to flick it off his pads, but it just gets a top edge that flies to square leg for a simple catch. The dropped catch by Imrul hasn't cost Bangladesh much
drifting on the pads, length ball, turned to deep square leg
back of a length, punched firmly to cover, where Mahmudullah dives to his left and stops the ball
coming back into the batsman, who turns it off his pads to short fine leg. Quick single taken

popped it straight to mid-on not quite full enough for the drive, he stayed in his crease and tried to hit on the up, ends up spooning a simple catch to mid-on. He won't like watching replays of that. Soft dismissal and at the most inopportune time for his team
length ball on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
strays too far down leg and Mushfiqur couldn't get a glove to it, tumbling to his left. Two wides
back of a length outside off, punched to cover
full ball outside off, driven but cover intercepts
goes straighter that time, and Chase is able to tickle it very fine. They run hard and get three
flatter on the stumps, he stays in his crease and swipes across the line to deep midwicket. They run two again, and Mushfiqur isn't happy with Rubel's fielding effort running from square leg
well timed slog sweep bisects deep square leg and deep midwicket. Kept the ball flat and hard, it pings into the fence
goes deep in his crease to flick this to deep square leg
fuller ball on off, tapped to deep midwicket
back of a length on off, slower ball, tapped to cover
back of a length, only 115 clicks, nipping back into the batsman who tries to work it away and misses. The ball hits him and rolls away
fuller ball outside off, tentatively blocked into the off side. Hope wants the strike, but Chase turns down the risky single

mix up but he's safe this time Chase wanted the single, having tapped this past the bowler, but Hope was stuck to his crease and had his hand up. Chase took a few steps down, hurriedly turned back. The throw was very wide of the stumps, which gave him enough time to get back
back of a length outside off, he stays on the back foot and cuts it past point
back of a length again outside off, he flat bats it to mid-off for a quick single
angling across, back of a length, he stays in his crease and slaps it past cover
he stays still and steers this fuller ball that's angled across to third man
great timing back of a length angling across, and Hope strokes it through cover off the back foot. Beats a despairing dive by the man running in from deep point
fuller ball, dug out to midwicket
stays back to whip this across the line to deep midwicket. Short ball on the stumps that didn't rise very high
yorker, dug out to mid-on.
fuller and flatter, angling into the batsman, punched to mid-on
length ball outside off, spinning away a tad, pushe dto point
fuller and more air, he comes forward to drive to long-off
drags it down short, he stays in his crease to punch it past cover

fuller once again, drawing him forward. But it's a good length and doesn't allow him to get to the pitch of the ball. Hope adjusts well though and waits and pushes the ball to point, where they take a single
fuller ball, driven back past the bowler for a comfortable single
past the outside edge, and just past off stump. Offcutter from Mustafizur, that defeats the attempted steer to third man
fuller ball, driven to cover
back of a length, angling across, it's short enough for him to be more sure-footed in running this down to third man
too full, and driven firmly to deep cover
fuller, kept a tad low. He tried to drive it back, but it rolled away off the inside edge

Chase falls into the trap and hits straight to mid-on Mashrafe had brought in long-on and long-off in Mustafizur's last over, tempting chase to go over the top. He tried dabs and steers, but finally fell prey to temptation, trying to go over the top. Ends up toe-ending to mid-off. Full ball, but not quite full for the drive, and he pays the price
back of a length on the stumps, punched to mid-on
good length, but drifting on the pads and tucked away to deep midwicket
short ball outside off, doesn't rise much. Nudged into the off side for a quick single
back of a length on off, punched to mid-off
back of a length outside off again, pushed to point

fuller ball, comes forward to drive it, goes past cover, but Shakib runs around at the fence from deep extra cover and stops it with his boot. Almost did a football pass to the player running in from the other side
pushes this into the off side
back of a length outside off, swatted to deep midwicket. Hope goes to 99
back of a length, kept really low but Paul stayed still in his crease and brought his bat down, opening the face to run it to point

third ODI century for Shai Hope, standing applause from the dugout he acknowledges the cheers, but no extravagant celebration because the job remains undone. back of a length on off, and he punched it to deep cover
pushes this into the off side and they go through for a quick single. A wild overthrow results in an extra run
length ball on off, he wanted to push it into the off side and run again, but hits this too firm and too straight, back to the bowler. No run
digs this in short, and it goes above Hope's head. Called wide. Marginal, but fair
short again, but not rising as high. Rocks on to the back foot and pulls it through midwicket for a four
short ball again but bowled into the body. Very well played by Hope, who tucks it towards midwicket with soft hands, so that they can run two
slower ball, ends up as a full toss, he opens the face to glide it to third man
short ball again outside off, pulled down in front of square to deep square leg
fuller ball, flicked to deep square leg

bouncer on target Gets it right this time, rising just enough to whistle past his head and completely defeat his intended pull. The batsman thought he'll get a wide, but this was legal. Ooh replays show that it went over his helmet actually. Maybe that should have been a wide. Lucky break for Bangladesh
fuller ball angling into the pads, worked to deep square leg
came back with the arm and kept low, almost caught him on the crease, but Paul got his bat down in time while stepping away to keep it from hitting the stumps
takes a step forward to defend
doesn't get hold of that either. quicker and flatter, tried to step away again but only under-edges it
stays in his crease that time, and steers it towards point. Still no run
comes forward to defend solidly. Only one run off that over
goes deep in his crease to flick this to deep square

dropped, but a fine effort It was a matter of time before Paul went for it. He got down to slog sweep, got a top edge that flew towards midwicket. The fielder running in dived forward and got hands to it, but couldn't hold on. Nazmul was the fielder
pushed to long-off
flatter, pushed towards point
stays back and tucks it to fine leg
reverse sweep connects well and they run hard to complete two
angled across Paul who just hangs his bat. Had no clue about the off-cutter. Good length so it passes the bat perfectly
goes a bit shorter and that rises up to chest high. Paul just about manages to tap it down and they take a quick single
brilliant shot moves across his stumps, used the pace to pick it up from outside off to lift it over fine leg.
made as if to move across again but stayed still eventually, driving this full ball to deep cover
too full, but wide of off, angling across, he chops it to point
angles across him again. Short of a length that time, and Paul is left looking lost again as he tries, and fails, to lay bat on ball with an attempted steer
bowls it into his pads, and he stays back to turn this to fine leg
tossed up more, he was backing away and the ball kept going with the arm. Gets bat on it, chops it on the ground to point
backing away again, but Shakib doesn't follow him fully, allowing him to push ti to long-off
pushed to cover, and an early call of 'NO'
fuller ball on the stumps, he comes forward to try and turn it away, but can't get past midwicket
stays back in his crease and punches this to deep cover
goes across him, too wide of off, and he hits it powerfully through cover, but there is a man back and only one run results
full ball, dug out via  checked drive that went in the air over cover. Fortunately for him, not where a fielder was
almighty swipe across the line but he doesn't connect. Only goes to mid-off and they get through for a quick single
back of a length angling across, pushed to point
slower ball, yorker. Sneaks under his bat, but it's angled across, so misses off stump too.

swish and miss again. Angled across once again and once again he connects only with air when trying to cut it away. Too close to cut, but he also hasn't read Mustafizur's changes of pace and off-cutters at all
bang what a start to the over. full length, he cleared his front leg and whacked it straight back over the bowler, and over the rope too
overthrows keep Hope on strike driven firmly to point and they are completing a comfortable single but the fielder has a shy, It's too wild and allows a second
digs in a bouncer. Hope ducks underneath and looks at the umpire, but he signals that it's legit and it's one bouncer for the over
yorker goes wrong and ends up as a full toss. The big drive also goes a bit wrong, in that he doesn't get the placement right. straight to deep cover
good short ball from Rubel, and Paul has a wild heave that connects with nothing

dropped at deep square leg Another short ball, Paul nailed the pull that time and hit it hard, and flat. Nazmul was there but the ball was travelling. He over-ran it in fact, and then stuck out a hand to just about stop it, but never looked like catching it
moves across his stumps and manages to get enough bat on it to flick it to midwicket and get off strike
fuller outside off, sliced to sweeper cover
goes too wide across and that will be a wide. Extra run and extra ball
goes very wide across again and Hope connects well. Backs away and slaps it past point. Third man was running towards it but the ball beats him
gets it away again, this is fantastic batting Fizz went short outside off that time, he transferred weight back and slapped it to wide long-off for another four. Great placement
misses the attempted glide that time, with Fizz keeping it full and in the yorker zone. Goes across Hope and to the keeper

over the keeper and a boundary 16 runs off the over. what a shot that was. He went down on one knee to paddle it, ended up not timing it well and hitting it right back over the keeper from one knee. No fielder there and it's another boundary
too short, and he stays back to swat it to deep midwicket. The boundary is long enough for them to run two. Good running, but it also means Paul stays on strike
too short again, and pulled. In the air but bounces well in front of deep midwicket
too short again, Hope stays low and swivel-pulls to deep square leg

too short again, and pulled away again, and they run a hard two. West Indies have won Magnificent, magnificent knock by Shai Hope. It's the first win for West Indies on tour after two bad defeats in the Tests and one thrashing in the first ODI. But they have now levelled the series and there is all to play for in the last ODI.
